5.Pros: This job is a good, entry-level position. If you want to learn at a fast pace and get some experience in hands on, customer-oriented service, then this is the right pick for you. You will be required to multi-task, anticipate the customer's needs, and always, always, offer service with a smile. Must be quick, correct, and congenial. Check your feelings at the door, and keep it professional.
5.Cons: This job is fast paced, and high stress. Yes, you learn alot of new things, and yes, you meet alot of new people. BUT. If you cannot handle the customers when they are not being polite and you are, if you cannot handle doing your job, plus some extra stuff, and if you cannot handle needing to stay on your toes and get it done Fast + Right, then this is not the job for you.

6.Pros: they have great benefits for employees
6.Cons: To move up in the company is getting harder because of the restructuring of the business

7.Cons: Everything that was great about McD as it relates to how people are treated, culture and values is non existent.

8.Cons: Can be a pain being salary.

9.Cons: Lower pay and hard to get increase
